FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Harpoon Gun

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Can I put this on Decepticons?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes, just because it is an Autobot card doesn’t mean that restricts who you can play it on. Take Energon Mace as an inverse example.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens when I attack with this on a character who is a Leader, but isn’t a Wrecker?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    You only get an additional +1, making the total added value of this card +2 ATK, Bold 1, Pierce 1.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens when I attack with this on a character who is a Wrecker, but isn’t a Leader?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    You only get an additional +1, making the total added value of this card +2 ATK, Bold 1, Pierce 1.
  4. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Do I get both bonuses if I attack with a character who is both a Leader and a Wrecker?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes.
  5. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Does my character keep the bonuses from the “attacks” triggers if my opponent reveals a     Sabotaged Armaments? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    You would keep the bonus ATK from the second and third abilities, if applicable. However, you would lose the Weapon’s static +1 ATK, Bold 1, and Pierce 1 that it normally gives.
